title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 281.11 - Reopening of decision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 281.11 - Reopening of decision

State Regulations

The commissioner may, solely on his own motion, reopen a
prior decision where in his judgment the interest of justice will be served
thereby. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
281.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
